title: Motivating Kids to Reflect the Character of God, Part 8
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary: John and Danny explain how thinking about and implementing consequences may sometimes be more effective in parenting than just handing out rewards and punishments.
description: John and Danny explain how thinking about and implementing consequences may sometimes be more effective in parenting than just handing out rewards and punishments.
content:encoded: John and Danny explain how thinking about and implementing consequences may sometimes be more effective in parenting than just handing out rewards and punishments.
